tasks.label: build debug cmake
tasks.command: mkdir -p build/src/etc && mkdir -p build/src/log && mkdir -p build/src/server_cache && mkdir -p build/src/image_cache && cp utils/eve-server.xml utils/devtools.raw utils/log.ini build/src/etc && cd build && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug .. && make -j16
